thread.title: BRIEF-UPS Announces New Worldwide Express Freight Midday Service

title: BRIEF-UPS Announces New Worldwide Express Freight Midday Service
text:
41 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-UPS Announces New Worldwide Express Freight Midday Service Reuters Staff 
Feb 8 (Reuters) - United Parcel Service Inc: 
* UPS ANNOUNCES NEW WORLDWIDE EXPRESS FREIGHT MIDDAY SERVICE 
* UPS - INTRODUCTION OF UPS WORLDWIDE EXPRESS FREIGHTâ„¢ MIDDAY, AN EXTENSION OF CURRENT UPS WORLDWIDE EXPRESS FREIGHT SERVICE 
* UPS - UPS WORLDWIDE EXPRESS FREIGHT SERVICE HAS EXPANDED TO LEBANON, LATVIA, AND LITHUANIA AND ADDED OUTBOUND SERVICE TO SAUDI ARABIA 
* UPS - ALSO ANNOUNCED EXPANSION OF UPS WORLDWIDE EXPRESS PRODUCT TO MORE THAN 7,000 POSTAL CODES IN 57 COUNTRIES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
